flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Its tail has ansmall brain of itsnown. Beware! Iffyou get close, itnmay react to yournscent and bite.
Its tail, whichnalso contains ansmall brain, mayfbite on its own ifnit notices annalluring smell.
When it is inndanger, its tailnuses some sort offmysterious powersnto drive away thenenemy.

GIRAFARIG’s rear head also has a brain,nbut it is small. The rear head attacks innresponse to smells and sounds.fApproaching this POKéMON from behindncan cause the rear head to suddenlynlash out and bite.
GIRAFARIG’s rear head contains a tinynbrain that is too small for thinking.nHowever, the rear head doesn’t need tofsleep, so it can keep watch over itsnsurroundings 24 hours a day.
A GIRAFARIG is an herbivore--it eatsngrass and tree shoots. While it is eating,nits tail makes chewing and swallowingnmotions as if it were also eating.
Its tail, which also contains a smallnbrain, may bite on its own if it notices annalluring smell.
Its tail has a small brain of its own.nBeware! If you get close, it may reactnto your scent and bite.
Its tail also has a small brain.nIt bites to repel any foe tryingnto sneak up on it from behind.
While it sleeps, the head on itsntail keeps watch. The tail doesn’tnneed to sleep.
The head on its tail contains ansmall brain. It can instinctivelynfight even while facing backward.
Its tail has a small brain of itsnown. Beware! If you get close, itnmay react to your scent by biting.
Its tail, which also contains ansmall brain, may bite on its own ifnit notices an alluring smell.
La tête qu’il a sur la queue disposende son propre cerveau et luinpermet de couvrir ses arrières.
The head on its tail contains ansmall brain. It can instinctivelynfight even while facing backward.
La tête qu’il a sur la queue disposende son propre cerveau et luinpermet de couvrir ses arrières.
The head on its tail contains ansmall brain. It can instinctivelynfight even while facing backward.
The head on its tail contains ansmall brain. It can instinctivelynfight even while facing backward.
The head on its tail contains ansmall brain. It can instinctivelynfight even while facing backward.
ねむっている　あいだ　しっぽのnあたまが　あたりを　みはっている。nしっぽは　ねむらなくても　へいき。
잠자는 동안 꼬리의n머리가 주위를 망보고 있다.n꼬리는 잠을 잘 필요가 없다.
La tête sur sa queue monte la garde quand il dort.nElle n’a pas besoin de dormir.
Während es schläft, hält sein Schweif Wache.nDieser benötigt keinen Schlaf.
Cuando duerme, la cabeza de su cola se quedanvigilando, ya que ella no necesita dormir.
La testa che ha sulla coda rimane vigile mentre dorme.nLa coda, infatti, non ha bisogno di riposare.
While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch.nThe tail doesn’t need to sleep.
眠っている　あいだ　尻尾の　頭がnあたりを　見張っている。n尻尾は　眠らなくても　平気。
しっぽにも　ちいさな　のうがある。nちかよると　においに　はんのうしてnかみついて　くるので　ちゅうい。
꼬리에도 작은 뇌가 있다.n다가가면 냄새에 반응해서n물어서 공격하므로 주의하자.
Sa queue possède un cerveau. Si vous vous ennapprochez, elle vous sentira et vous mordra.
Sein Schweif hat ein eigenes Gehirn. Achtung!nKommst du ihm zu nahe, kann es dich riechennund beißt.
Su cola tiene un pequeño cerebro. ¡Cuidado! Si tenacercas, puede reaccionar a tu olor y morder.
La coda possiede un cervello autonomo. Se ci sinavvicina può fiutare la presenza e mordere.
Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If younget close, it may react to your scent by biting.
尻尾にも　小さな　脳がある。n近寄ると　においに　反応してnかみついて　くるので　注意。
シッポの　あたまにも　ちいさな　のうが　ある。nにおいや　おとに　はんのうして　こうげきするのでnうしろから　ちかよると　いきなり　かみつかれる。
꼬리의 머리에도 작은 뇌가 있다.n냄새나 소리에 반응하여 공격하기 때문에n뒤에서 접근하면 느닷없이 물린다.

La tête à l’arrière de Girafarig a aussi un cerveau, mais il estnplus petit. Elle attaque en réponse aux sons et aux odeurs.nSi on approche de ce Pokémon par derrière, cette petite têtenpeut tout à coup jaillir et mordre.

Der Kopf an Girafarigs Hinterteil hat ein eigenes Gehirn.nEr reagiert mit Angriffen auf Gerüche und Geräusche.nWenn man sich diesem Pokémon von hinten nähert,nkönnte der hintere Kopf plötzlich vorschnellen und zubeißen.

Girafarig tiene un cerebro también en la cabeza de la cola quenreacciona atacando ante olores y sonidos. Cuando alguien senacerca a este Pokémon por la espalda, puede provocar que lancabeza trasera se abalance y lo muerda.

La testa posteriore di Girafarig è dotata di un cervellonpiccolissimo. Attacca soltanto in risposta agli odorine ai suoni. Avvicinando questo Pokémon da dietronsussiste il pericolo di essere morsi dalla testa posteriore.

Girafarig’s rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rearnhead attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approachingnthis Pokémon from behind can cause the rear head to suddenlynlash out and bite.
シッポの　頭にも　小さな　脳が　ある。n臭いや　音に　反応して　攻撃するのでn後ろから　近寄ると　いきなり　かみつかれる。
しっぽの　のうは　かんがえごとが　できないほどnちいさいけど　ねむらなくても　へいき　なのでn２４じかん　あたりを　みはりつづけて　いるぞ。
꼬리의 뇌는 생각을 할 수 없을 정도로n작지만 자지 않아도 괜찮아서n24시간 주변을 계속 망보고 있다.
La tête à l’arrière de Girafarig abrite un cerveau trop petitnpour penser. En revanche, cette tête arrière n’a pas besoinnde dormir, ce qui lui permet de monter la garde tout le temps.

Der Kopf an Girafarigs Hinterteil verfügt nur übernein kleines Gehirn, mit dem es nicht denken kann.nDieses Gehirn benötigt jedoch keinen Schlaf undnist somit in der Lage, die Umgebung rund um dienUhr im Auge zu behalten.
La cabeza trasera de Girafarig tiene un cerebro muy pequeñonpara pensar, pero, como no le hace falta dormir, al menosnpuede hacer de centinela las 24 horas del día.
La testa posteriore di Girafarig contiene un cervello minuto,ntroppo piccolo per pensare. Tuttavia, questa testolina nonndorme mai, così può rimanere di sorveglianza 24 ore su 24.
Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small fornthinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so itncan keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
尻尾の　脳は　考えごとが　出来ないほどn小さいけど　眠らなくても　平気　なのでn２４時間　あたりを　見張り続けて　いるぞ。
